diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Viral infection, cranial trauma, neoplastic activity
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The MRI revealed an absent right olfactory bulb, minimal left olfactory bulb, and blunted olfactory sulci bilaterally, which are key radiologic manifestations of Kallmann syndrome. The patient presented with anosmia in conjunction with a medical history that included cryptorchidism and short stature, further supporting the diagnosis.
